analysis.description:
CoreContract._payChain (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#743-757) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _owners[i].transfer(_price.mul(_chainFees[i]).div(1000)) (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol)

	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#38-39)

TokenLayer._owns (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#515-519) uses a dangerous strict equality:

TokenLayer.tokensOfOwner (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#241-269) uses a dangerous strict equality:

Reentrancy in TokenLayer.incrementPrice (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#341-359):

	- _totalFees = getChainFees(_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/22/0xca82cfcfbe9eed35f7afee9c17755c679be13241.sol#347-350)
